title: Spiritual Solutions for Confrontation
description:
No matter how spiritual you are, you WILL have to deal with confrontation. Take it from me! An hour before I recorded this Dear Gabby, I was in the midst of a sh*tstorm. This confrontation was the greatest test of my conflict-resolution skills. Using my personal story, I’ll walk you through 8 spiritual steps you can use to turn conflict into connection.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

 

This episode of Dear Gabby touched on relationships. We covered how to set boundaries with love and how to bring more compassion to people who activate your protector parts. If you want to go deeper with this work and gain a better understanding of your relationship patterns, take my FREE 2-minute What’s Your Attachment Style? quiz. When you understand your attachment style, you can start to undo any patterns that are keeping you stuck in unfulfilling relationships. https://bit.ly/3bBMuS6 

Want more spiritual support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3Qklk0I

 

If you feel you need additional support, please consult this list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3bxCKbB

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

We have a special deal for our audience: Get your first visit with an Apostrophe provider for only five dollars at Apostrophe.com/GABBY when you use our code: GABBY.

 

Athletic Greens is going to give you a FREE 1 year supply of immune-supporting Vitamin D AND 5 FREE travel packs with your first purchase. All you have to do is visit athleticgreens.com/gabby.

 

Chime. No Monthly Fees. No vibe-killing fees.Sign-up for a Chime Checking Account only takes two minutes and doesn’t affect your credit score. Get started at chime.com/gabby.

 

Perfect Bar knows it will be love at first bite, so for a limited time, they’re offering you a chance to try their Refrigerated Protein Bars for FREE. All you have to do is go to perfectsnacks.com/gabby to get a FREE Perfect Bar today.

 

Produced by Dear Media.
